metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4342 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in Cacti before 0.8.8d allows remote attackersto execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors involving a cdefid.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.1').
